channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly News - August 2024
item.description:
Microsoft Defender for Cloud Monthly news August 2024 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from July 2024.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcasts (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External content
Product improvements
Announcements
Microsoft Defender for Cloud
Support for MMA for Defender for Servers Plan 2 has been extended for Defender for Cloud customers until the end of Nov...
